description: Времена Present Simple, Past Simple, Future Simple. Present Progressive, Past Progressive, Future Progressive

sentences.eng: I am a cat named Matroskin.
I am a clever and well-mannered cat.
I always wash my face after meals,
sentences.rus: Я всегда умываюсь [после еды|после еды|after meals]

sentences.eng: and I know lots of interesting things.
For example,
I know everybody who lives, used to live long ago or will live in this building.
sentences.rus: я знаю всех, кто живет, жил давным-давно или будет жить в этом доме.

sentences.eng: Yesterday I met uncle Theodor.
sentences.rus: Вот вчера я встретил [дядю Федора|дядя Федор|uncle Theodor].

sentences.eng: He is a boy from the fourth floor.
He was going upstairs
sentences.rus: Он [поднимался по лестнице|подниматься по лестнице|to go upstairs]

sentences.eng: and eating a sausage sandwich
sentences.rus: и ел [бутерброд с колбасой|бутерброд с колбасой|a sausage sandwich],

sentences.eng: when he saw me.
And we started to talk.
We were talking while he was eating his sandwich,
sentences.rus: Мы болтали, пока он ел свой бутерброд,

sentences.eng: and then he gave me a bit.
sentences.rus: а потом он дал мне [кусочек|кусочек|a bit].

sentences.eng: He is very friendly.
He is studying now,
but he'll be free in the summer.
In the summer we will go to the countryside together!
sentences.rus: И мы вместе с ним поедем в [деревню|деревня|countryside]!

sentences.eng: We'll find a house
and start to live in it.
We'll have a cow…
It will be feeding in the field
while we are doing different house work.
sentences.rus: пока мы будем делать всякие домашние дела.

sentences.eng: And I'll be milking it
while uncle Theodor is writing letters to his parents…
sentences.rus: а [дядя Федор|дядя Федор|uncle Theodor] писать письма родителям…

sentences.eng: His parents are rather strict.
They work in the winter
and go on vacations in the summer.
sentences.rus: а летом [ездят в отпуск|ездить в отпуск|to go on vacations/holidays].

sentences.eng: They are planning their future vacations already.
Last year they bought a new suitcase while they were on holidays in Sochi,
sentences.rus: В прошлом году они купили себе новый [чемодан|чемодан|a suitcase], пока [отдыхали|отдыхать|to be on holidays, to rest] в Сочи,

sentences.eng: and now they want to go abroad.
sentences.rus: и теперь они хотят поехать за рубеж.

sentences.eng: Well, they don't know where uncle Theodor and I will really go!
sentences.rus: Эх, не знают они, куда мы с [дядей Федором|дядя Федор|uncle Theodor] отправимся на самом деле!
